name: Bodyguard
quote: “I’ll stand around looking tough for $100 a day, but it costs more if you want me to actually do anything.”
abilities: After you draw, you must immediately discard a card or give Bodyguard to another player. Sacrifice the Bodyguard to save any other Character from being killed.
title: Duel

name: Butt Kicking Mother
quote: “You see, I taught him everything he knows.”
abilities: Gains the ‘Kung Fu’ trait if you have any other ‘Family’ Character in your Movie.
title: Ultimate

name: Cartoon Schoolgirl
quote: “Stop looking up my skirt, pervert.”
abilities: The only Creatures that can kill the Schoolgirl are ‘Anime’ Creatures.
title: Silk

name: Cat Burglar
quote: “No, that doesn’t mean I steal cats.”
abilities: On your turn, instead of playing a Prop on the Cat Burglar, you may discard a card to steal a Prop from another player’s Movie and give it to the Cat Burglar.
title: Blackbelt

name: Clueless Gai Jin
quote: “Relax, it’s all in the reflexes.”
abilities: Gains no bonus from ‘Kung Fu’ ‘Weapons’. Cannot be given the ‘Kung Fu’ trait.
title: Little

name: Clumsy Sidekick
quote: “Oh, just blame it on Fong.”
abilities: Any player may discard 2 cards to make the Clumsy Sidekick discard a Prop.
title: Courage

name: Concubine
quote: “You know what they say about the size of a girl’s feet…”
abilities: Gives +1 DS to all ‘Males’ in the same Movie.
title: Bullet

name: Crazy Old Wizard
quote: “You will come out no more!”
abilities: Gains +2 DS if in the “Herbalist Shop”. DS = 6 vs. ‘Supernatural’ attacks.
title: Whirlwind

name: Disapproving Father
quote: “He gets this from your side of the family, you know.”
abilities: Gains +1 DS for every other ‘Family’ Character in your Movie.
title: Storm

name: Feisty Sibling
quote: “I’m telling!”
abilities: Gender trait must be declared when the Feisty Sibling is played. Sacrifice the Feisty Sibling to save any ‘Family’ Character from being killed.
title: Kickboxer

name: Gambler
quote: “Play your cards right, you might live to talk about it!”
abilities: Once on your turn, you may force any two players to reveal a card from their hands. The player with the higher AS or DS value keeps both cards. SFX cards are considered to have a value of zero. Ties go to the player who controls the Gambler.
title: Fatal

name: Helpful Servant
quote: “Please! I must be allowed to speak all my expository dialogue.”
abilities: On your turn, you may look at another player’s hand.
title: Secret

name: Honorable Samurai
quote: “I will give you the chance to die with honor.”
abilities: Gets double the DS bonus from all ‘Kung Fu’ ‘Weapons’. May not make Kung Fu attacks against knocked out Characters.
title: Tong

name: Impetuous Student
quote: “Insult me, but don’t insult my training!”
abilities: DS = 8 if in the “Dojo”.
title: Champion

name: Inscrutable Monk
quote: “Go ahead, scrute me. I dare you!”
abilities: May not use ‘Guns’.
title: Dojo

name: Masked Vigilante
quote: “I must know who you are.” “Get used to disappointment.”
abilities: Has no gender trait until it has been knocked out in a Kung Fu attack, at which point the controller chooses a gender. Until then no gender specific cards can be used against the Vigilante.
title: Yakuza

name: Maverick Cop
quote: “I’m getting too old for this…”
abilities: Gains double the printed DS bonus from ‘Guns’.
title: Death

name: Perverted Teenager With Powerful Innate Ability
quote: “If I’m so godlike, how come I can’t get any girls?”
abilities: During an attack against your Movie, Perverted Teen may boost his DS to 10. If he isn’t killed in the attack, he’s knocked out until the beginning of your next turn.
title: Honor

name: Scientist
quote: “General! I’ve figured out their weakness… wear these white gloves and blue helmet!”
abilities: DS = 7 vs. “Go-Jira”, “Giant Space Bug” and all ‘Anime’ attacks.
title: Great

name: Shopkeep Pushed to the Edge
quote: “Ass kicking in aisle 4.”
abilities: DS = 7 in a Kung Fu attack. May receive any number of Props in a single turn.
title: Warrior

name: Skippy the Wonder Chow
quote: “What’s that, Skippy? Your Kung Fu is strong?”
abilities: May not use Props.
title: Thief

name: Sumo Wrestler
quote: “Does this fundoshi make me look fat?” “Dude, you’re a sum wrestler. A house makes you look fat.”
abilities: Cannot be targeted by Kung Fu attacks.
title: Combat

name: Wise Old Master
quote: “Take this pebble from my hand.” SMACK! “Too slow!”
abilities: DS = 8 when involved in a Kung Fu attack.
title: Black

name: Angry Ghost
quote: “Boo!”
abilities: Gains +1 AS for every ‘Kung Fu’ Character in the target Movie.
title: Ancient

name: Dirty Cop
quote: “He’s not a cop, he’s Al Capone with a badge!”
abilities: May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS. If attacking a Movie with any “Cop” or “Police” cards in it AS = 22.
title: China

name: Evil Arch Enemy
quote: “You should not have come back, old man!”
abilities: Gains +2 AS for every ‘Old’ Character in the target Movie. May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS.
title: Godzilla

name: Evil Gangster
quote: “Co-operate and I may let you live… oh who am I trying to kid?”
abilities: May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS.
title: Temple

name: Evil Sorceress
quote: “I’m the girl your mother warned you about. You should have listened to her.”
abilities: May be combined with any other ‘Supernatural’ attack.
title: Shaolin

name: Evil Warlord
quote: “This will be of fine service for you, bag of scum. I am sure you will not mind that I remove your toenails and leave them out on the desert floor for ants to eat.”
abilities: Gains +2 AS for each Character in your Movie. May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS.
title: Snake

name: Giant Anthropomorphic War Machine
quote: “Oh great! It’s Super-ultra-mega-ultimo-monstro-zord. We’re screwed.”
abilities: Attacker may make the War Machine ‘Alien’ at any time.
title: Master

name: Giant Space Bug
quote: “That thing will crush us like… um… bugs.”
abilities: Attacker may make it ‘Anime’ at any time. If attack is successful you may destroy the victim’s Location as well as killing a Character.
title: Chinese

name: Go-jira
quote: “I hope we’re paid up on our giant monster rampage insurance.”
abilities: If successful, Go-jira may destroy the Location as well as killing a Character.
title: Tokyo

name: Hentai Demon
quote: “Now THAT’S a tentacle!”
abilities: If the Hentai Demon’s attack succeeds, it must choose a ‘Female’ victim if there is one.
title: Japanese

name: Hired Goons
quote: “Goons… hired goons.”
abilities: AS is doubled if target Movie contains only ‘Kung Fu’ Characters. May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS.
title: Return

name: Hitman
quote: “You understand this isn’t personal, don’t you?”
abilities: May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS. This card targets 1 character and the defender may only count that Character’s DS (plus any Props or Location) for the defense.
title: Way

name: Hopping Vampires
quote: “Boing… boing… boing!”
title: Golden

name: Kung Fu Samurai on Giant Robot Island
quote: “We shall make you wish we had never been born.”
abilities: May use ‘Kung Fu’ ‘Weapons’ to boost AS.
title: Tiger

name: Mutant Cyborgs
quote: “Two great creatures kill great together!”
abilities: Attacker may make this an ‘Alien’ at any time. May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS.
title: Island

name: Ninjas
quote: “Shhh!”
abilities: May use ‘Kung Fu’ ‘Weapons’ to boost AS. If the Ninjas succeed, they go back to your hand, but may not be used again this turn.
title: Fight

name: Smugglers
quote: “What the government doesn’t know… will make us a lot of money!”
abilities: May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS.
title: Part III

name: Street Gangs
quote: “Lords of Death… Chinatown punks.”
abilities: May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS.
title: Fire

name: The Guy Who Takes It In the Groin
quote: “I am darned unsatisfied to be killed in this way.”
abilities: Only succeeds if his AS exceeds the total DS by at least 5 points. May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS.
title: Escape

name: Yakuza Muscle
quote: “How do you make a fist with so many missing fingers?”
abilities: May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS. May be played as 2 Kung Fu attacks made against a single player, each with a strength of 5. Resolve attacks one at a time.
title: Revenge

name: Back Alley
quote: “Let’s you and me take this outside!”
abilities: All ‘Kung Fu’ Characters gain +1 DS while in the Back Alley.
title: Kick

name: Cargo Ship Full of Contraband
quote: “There are so many FBI, DEA and ATF jackets out there we could play Scrabble!”
abilities: May be attached to the “Port of Hong Kong”. “Smugglers” always succeeds in the Cargo Ship.
title: Bulletproof

name: Dojo
quote: “Same old rules: No eyes, no groin.”
abilities: DS = +10 vs. Kung Fu attacks.
title: Crouching

name: Factory
quote: “Now I will break machinery with my head!”
abilities: Every time you are attacked in the Factory you must discard a card from your hand if you can.
title: Punch

name: Herbalist Shop
quote: “Got any powdered rhino brain?” “Next week.” “Essence of giant squid ink?” “Sorry, fresh out.” “This is an HERBALIST shop isn’t it?”
abilities: After you draw, discard any number of cards to give each of your Characters a DS bonus equal to the number of cards you discarded. Bonus lasts until you draw cards again for any reason.
title: Eagle

name: Mansion
quote: “I will surround their house myself.”
abilities: DS = -5 vs. Creatures with the word “Evil” in their name.
title: Monkey

name: Mountain Pass
quote: “I hate heights.” “Then you are in the wrong place, my friend.”
title: Hero

name: Nuclear Power Plant
quote: “Don’t be silly! Nuclear power is perfectly safe…”
abilities: Attacker may give it the trait ‘Aquatic’. You may sacrifice the Power Plant from play to triple the strength of ALL attacks you make on the turn you sacrifice it.
title: Monster

name: Peasant Village
quote: “Nice looking place… burn it to the ground!”
abilities: DS = -5 vs. ‘Supernatural’ attacks.
title: Dragon

name: Police Station
quote: “Oooo! Mega-power up doughnuts!” “No, just regular ones… but they have sprinkles.”
abilities: All “Cops” gain an additional +2 DS while in the Police Station.
title: Pacific Rim

name: Port of Hong Kong
quote: “Now it’s Chinese, now it’s British, now it’s Chinese… make up your minds!”
abilities: “Evil Gangster” always succeeds at the Port.
title: Darkness

name: Secret Hideout
quote: “I’ll give you a hint, the password is the name of a fish.” “Is it Mary?” “That’s not a fish!” “Well she sure drinks like one!”
abilities: Anyone wishing to attack Characters at this Location must first discard 2 cards.
title: Target

name: Shaolin Temple
quote: “You have offended Shaolin. Now you die!”
abilities: 'Ninja’ attacks are half strength (round down) in the Temple.
title: Monk

name: Tokyo Skyline
quote: “Oh no! Tokyo will be destroyed… again!”
abilities: “Go-jira” always succeeds in the Tokyo Skyline.
title: Japan

name: Treetops
quote: “Crouching Tiger, Humming Bird.”
abilities: All non-’Kung Fu’ Characters lose -1 DS while in the Treetops.
title: Strike

name: Warehouse
quote: “What do you suppose is in all these crates?”
abilities: Can be attached to the “Port of Hong Kong”.
title: Assassin

name: B.F.G.
quote: “Gun wounds again?”
abilities: BFG is removed from play if, at any time, you have no cards in your hand.
title: Deadly

name: Bamboo Spear
quote: “Say hello to Mr. Pointy!”
abilities: Discard a card from your hand and the current player may not target you with Kung Fu attacks.
title: King

name: Black Pajamas
quote: “Why wasn’t I invited to your slumber party?”
abilities: Gives the ‘Kung Fu’ trait to the Character that wears them. OR play with a Creature to give it the trait ‘Ninja’ and to use ‘Kung Fu’ ‘Weapons’ to boost AS.
title: Commando

name: Bomb
quote: “Quiet, or I’ll blow your throat up!”
abilities: Discard Bomb from play to give your Character +15 DS until the end of the current attack. OR play as a Special Effect to kill a Character of your choice.
title: Trouble

name: Briefcase Full of Contraband
quote: “Think we’ll ever find out what’s in the case?”
abilities: Your hand size is increased by 1 while you have the Briefcase in play.
title: Crimelord

name: Crotch Rocket
quote: “It goes so fast, I get younger every time I drive it!”
abilities: A Character with the Crotch Rocket cannot be targeted by Kung Fu attacks.
title: Hong Kong

name: Ginseng
quote: “Here, eat this. It make smart.”
abilities: Sacrifice Ginseng for a bonus of +8 DS for the duration of the current attack.
title: Sport

name: Helicopter
quote: “It’s traditional to ride sitting on the inside, not swinging from the skid.”
title: Big

name: Katana
quote: “This hot sword will pierce your family dynasty!”
abilities: The printed DS is doubled when attached to ‘Kung Fu’ Characters.
title: Samurai

name: Magic Potion
quote: “What’s in there, magic potion?” “Yeah..” “Good. Thought so.”
abilities: DS = +6 in the “Herbalist Shop” or in the hands of the “Crazy Old Wizard”. Discard from play to stop one attack.
title: Mysterious

name: Military Assault Rifle
quote: “I’ll fire aimlessly if you don’t come out!”
title: Killer

name: Nunchuks
quote: “Wooden dowling: $1.00; length of chain: $0.75; beating the snot out of someone kung fu style: Priceless!”
abilities: DS = +8 vs. any NON-’Supernatural’, NON-’Alien’ or NON-’Monster’ attack.
title: School

name: Poison Dagger
quote: “The inscription reads ‘Keep out of reach of children.’”
abilities: Gives +10 AS to ‘Ninja’ attacks.
title: Cop

name: Sports Car
quote: “I never drive faster than I can see.”
abilities: On your turn you may discard 2 cards to switch Locations with any player or the discard pile.
title: Shanghai

name: Throwing Stars
quote: “Ninja stars are for losers.”
abilities: Grants double the printed DS bonus to ‘Kung Fu’ Characters and to Creatures that can use ‘Kung Fu’ ‘Weapons’. OR play with a Creature to give it the trait ‘Ninja’.
title: Ninja

name: Transforming Robot Power Armor
quote: “Yeah, but does it have power steering?”
abilities: Gives the trait ‘Anime’. Characters with this Prop may not have any other ‘Vehicles’ or ‘Weapons’.
title: Robot

name: Uzi
quote: “Be careful, they may have uzis.” “I don’t care what they’ve been drinking.”
abilities: Gives +12 AS to “Evil Gangster”, “Hired Goons”, and “Dirty Cop”.
title: Dynasty

name: Roll the Credits 1
quote: “Tokyo has been flattened and the monster persuaded to return to the sea… It must be over.”
title: Kung-Fu

name: Roll the Credits 2
quote: “Most everyone is dead, justice is done, and no one is happy… it must be over.”
title: Fist

name: 10,000 Bullets
quote: “There is no Chinese word for ‘reload.’”
abilities: Triple the bonus of all ‘Gun’ Props in your Movie for the duration of the current attack and remove the trait ‘Swarm’ if the attack has it.
title: Rage

name: Ancient Family Curse
quote: “Some things are best left in the past.”
abilities: All ‘Family’ Characters in target Movie lose 1 DS while this card is in play. Remove this card from play if, at any time, the target Movie has no ‘Family’ Characters.
title: Leaping

name: And I’ll Form the Head!
quote: “Why do we always wait till the end to do this?”
abilities: Attacking player may combine as many Creature cards as they like into a single attack. The Strength is doubled if the attack contains the “Giant Anthropomorphic War Machine”.
title: Boss

name: Bad Dubbing
quote: “How can you use my intestines as a gift?”
abilities: Halve (round down) either the Attack Strength or Defense Strength for the duration of the current attack.
title: Venom

name: Bend Like the Sapling
quote: “Snatch this pebble from my ha… well, I guess you’re ready after all.”
abilities: Stop any card (except “Roll the Credits”) as it is being played and put that card into your hand.
title: Tsunami

name: Big Eyes Small Mouth
quote: “I know it makes no sense, but the animation is AWESOME!”
abilities: Give a Character a permanent +2 DS and the trait ‘Anime’ for as long as the Character remains in play. OR make a Creature ‘Anime’ and double its current AS.
title: Shogun

name: Black Belt
quote: “The perfect accessory… black goes with ANYthing!”
abilities: Give a Character a permanent +2 DS and the trait ‘Kung Fu’ for as long as the Character remains in play.
title: Claw

name: Chase Scene
quote: “Follow that rickshaw!”
abilities: Take a ‘Vehicle’ from the discard pile and put it on one of your Characters. OR kill one Character if it has a ‘Vehicle’ Prop.
title: Tournament

name: Cheesy Sound Effects
quote: “That guy threw one punch but I counted 8 impact sounds. He must be really good!”
abilities: Double the Strength of one ‘Ninja’ or ‘Kung Fu’ attack.
title: Iron

name: Chinese Standoff
quote: “No you drop YOUR weapon.”
abilities: Starting with the current player, each player must discard one card from their Movie or hand. Continue discarding until one player has no cards in their hand.
title: Quest

name: Climactic Battle
quote: “Beware! Your bones are going to be disconnected.”
abilities: Sacrifice any number of Characters from your Movie. Each of your opponents must choose an equal number of Characters to discard from their Movies. If a player has fewer Characters than you sacrifices, they lose all their Characters.
title: Street Fighter

name: Cloud the Mind
quote: “Invisibility is in the eye of the beholder.”
abilities: Stop one Special Effect card as it is being played. The Special Effect is discarded with no effect.
title: Evil

name: Deadly Ambush
quote: “Yah-hah, evil spider woman! I have captured you by the short rabbits and can now deliver you to your doctor for a thorough examination!”
abilities: Discard any two Creatures from your hand and kill one Character of your choice.
title: Hand

name: Die With Honor
quote: “Who gave you the nerve to get killed here?”
abilities: Sacrifice one of your ‘Male’ Characters to save a ‘Female’ Character from being killed.
title: Adventure

name: Dishonor Your Family
quote: “Shame on you, young man!”
abilities: Kill one Character with the ‘Kung Fu’ trait OR permanently remove the special rules text from any Character.
title: Cobra

name: Family Heirloom
quote: “My father got it from his father, who got it from his father, who got it from some guy.”
abilities: Triple the printed DS value of one Prop and give it the trait ‘Treasure’ for as long as it remains in play.
title: Fury

name: Feet of Fury, Hands of Hurt
quote: “Taste my flying windmill of death, chump!”
abilities: Triple the printed DS of one ‘Kung Fu’ Character for as long as it lives. Bonus is lost if the Character ever has any non-’Kung Fu’ weapons.
title: Finger

name: Feint
quote: “Look! The man who killed your brother!”
abilities: Switch hands with another player. If played on your turn, this card ends your turn.
title: Justice

name: Focus Chi
quote: “Kiii-yaah, mother f****r!”
abilities: Triple the total DS (including Props) of one ‘Kung Fu’ Character for the duration of the current attack.
title: Law

name: Heaps of Broken Stuntmen
quote: “Hey Sammo, call Central Casting. We need another dozen!”
abilities: Add +4 DS for the duration of one attack OR kill one Character in the Movie that is being attacked.
title: Crane

name: Incomprehensible Dialogue
quote: “My favorite son. His great talent with a sword. His totally unrestrained way of living. How dearly I loved that one-eyed son of mine.”
abilities: All other players lose their next turn. You can’t play “Roll the Credits” on this or your next turn. This card can only be played successfully once in the game.
title: Hunt

name: Kidnapping
quote: “Say that I am your new master, and I’ll let you have some ice cream.”
abilities: If your Kung Fu attack succeeds, you may add the beaten character to your Movie instead of knocking it out.
title: Blood

name: Kill By Stealth
quote: “This mission requires silence. Oil your slippers.”
abilities: Double the Strength of the current attack and give it the trait ‘Ninja’.
title: Versus

name: Meditation
quote: “What is the sound of one hand punching?”
abilities: One ‘Smart’ Character of your choice gains a permanent +3 DS.
title: Magic

name: Mistaken Identity
quote: “What do you mean you killed the wrong guy?” “Sir, all those round-eyes look the same to me.”
abilities: Take a Character from the discard pile and put it directly into your Movie.
title: Hidden

name: Slaughter of the Innocents
quote: “No one is innocent, commander, there are just varying degrees of guilt.”
abilities: For every card you discard you may kill one ‘Old’, ‘Young’, or ‘Female’ Character.
title: Rumble

name: Slo-Mo Sequence
quote: “They’re… get… ting… a… way…!”
abilities: Play before an attack. During the next attack, no player may play more than one Special Effect.
title: Peking

name: Smoke Bomb
quote: “Where did he go?”
abilities: Play any time during an attack (before the victim has been chosen). The target of the attack takes any card they have in their Movie and puts it into their hand. Any cards attached to that card are discarded from play.
title: Mountain

name: Spirits of the Ancestors
quote: “Understand that we’re only helping you out because we don’t want you slouching about the afterlife with us.”
abilities: Count the number of Characters in the discard pile and add that number to your DS for the duration of the current attack.
title: Battle

name: Spring the Trap
quote: “We have them now!”
abilities: Kill one ‘Dumb’ Character.
title: Phantom

name: Stronger Kung Fu
quote: “Your kung fu is not as better as mine.”
abilities: Triple the Strength of one Kung Fu attack OR stop one attack of any sort if you have a ‘Kung Fu’ Character in play.
title: Five

name: Stupid Flowery Girl Power
quote: “Mystical Venus Love Bubble Attack!”
abilities: Add +3 DS for the duration of the current attack OR stop one ‘Anime’ attack.
title: Story

name: Suppression Fire
quote: “Hot lead! Who wants some nice, hot lead?”
abilities: Add +3 DS for the duration of the current attack OR stop one attack if you have a ‘Gun’ in play. Cannot be used to stop a ‘Swarm’ attack.
title: Weapon

name: Surprise Inheritance
quote: “Your father wanted you to have this when you were ready, but frankly, I don’t have that kind of time!”
abilities: Take one Prop or Location from the discard pile and put it immediately into your Movie.
title: Wolf

name: Tournament of Blood
quote: “Now commences the dying!”
abilities: Kill all ‘Kung Fu’ Characters. Any player may save a ‘Kung Fu’ Character by discarding 3 cards from their hand.
title: Ferocious

name: Ultimate Insult
quote: “What did you say about my kung fu?”
abilities: Force the current player to make a Kung Fu attack (if they have a ‘Kung Fu’ Character). Regardless of the outcome, the Character making the attack is killed at the end of the current turn.
title: Challenge

name: Unbeatable Defense
quote: “Wax on. Wax off.”
abilities: Add +3 DS for the duration of the current attack OR stop one Kung Fu attack.
title: Hitman

name: Unnatural Powers
quote: “Did you know he could do that?”
abilities: Remove any one card from play.
title: Brawl

name: Use His Size Against Him
quote: “The bigger they are, the harder they land on you.”
abilities: Reverse the outcome of one attack.
title: Night

name: Whirlwind Attack
quote: “And there’s plenty more where that came from!”
abilities: If your Kung Fu attack succeeds, you may knock out an additional Character for every 2 cards your discard.
title: Force

name: Wire Fu
quote: “Whoa, flying dudes!”
abilities: Double either the Attack Strength or Defense Strength for the duration of the current attack.
title: Legend

name: Wisdom vs. Youth
quote: “Take my advice or I’ll spank you a lot.”
abilities: Add +3 DS against any attack OR stop one attack if you have an ‘Old’ Character in play.
title: Steel
